titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

action.text: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Alexander. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions for the 115th Congress.
